name: Zesty Hunt - Little Lemon Friends
description:
ZESTY HUNT - THE LITTLE LEMON PALS HAVE RUN AMOK Play as parent lemon as you pick up your trusty Lemon Launcher to quell their silly antics!  Here's a 3D first-person shooter (FPS) inspired by the zesty Little Lemons NFT Community! Developed this game over the span of 3-4 days by myself, amidst university commitments and internship deliverables. Wanted to create a unique, meme-worthy experience that puts you in the shoes of parent lemon! Shooting lemons should be a crime, but not in this lemon metaverse! 👀

Not a diamond lemon holder, but here's hoping I'd get airdropped one 🍋💎

PS: All rights go to Little Lemons NFT. No copyright infringement intended. This is a passion project that does not profit over its usage.  I designed, developed, and scripted the 3D assets, animations, and game mechanics of the minigame myself unless otherwise mentioned. Join the Little Lemons Community on Discord here! 

CONTROLS:

WASD - Forward, Left, Backward, Right respectively

SPACE - Jump

LEFT CTRL - Crouch

LEFT SHIFT - Sprint

LEFT MOUSE CLICK - Fire lemons

Use mouse to aim and face different directions
